summary: In a village on the French Opal Coast, a drifter engages in a perplexing relationship with a young woman who has suffered abuse.
cast: David Dewaele|Alexandra Lemâtre|Christophe Bon|Juliette Bacquet|Aurore Broutin|Sonia Barthélémy|Valérie Mestdagh|Dominique Caffier
keywords: female full frontal nudity|barking dog|beating with a stick|blood|dead body
title: Hors Satan
